Gestational diabetes puts the infant at risk for a great deal of complicantions, ranging from hypoglycemia (very low sugar) to acute respiratory distress. Other complications include high birth weight requiring c section or risk to nerves inthe arm and shoulder during vaginal birth.If mom has it but she is able to keep her blood sugars in the  normal range the babies risk drop down to average.Good luck
